verses.name: Micah 4:5
verses.text: For all people will walk every one in the name of his god, and we will walk in the name of the Lord our God for ever and ever.

verses.name: Micah 4:6
verses.text: In that day, saith the Lord, will I assemble her that halteth, and I will gather her that is driven out, and her that I have afflicted;

verses.name: Micah 4:7
verses.text: And I will make her that halted a remnant, and her that was cast far off a strong nation: and the Lord shall reign over them in mount Zion from henceforth, even for ever.
